text: Florence Billings (born 1895) was an American film actress of the silent era.Goble p.131 ==Selected filmography== * The Spreading Dawn (1917) * Woman (1918) * The Fair Pretender (1918) * The Great Victory (1919) * Her Game (1919) * The Probation Wife (1919) * The Woman Game (1920) * The Wonder Man (1920) * The Wakefield Case (1921) * Handcuffs or Kisses (1921) * Worlds Apart (1921) * Why Announce Your Marriage? (1922) * Who Are My Parents? (1922) * For Another Woman (1924) * Sinners in Heaven (1924) * Greater Than Marriage (1924) * Miss Bluebeard (1925) * The Heart of a Siren (1925) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1895 births Category:Year of death unknown Category:American film actresses Category:Actresses from New York City
title: Florence Billings
